name: Gryd
description:
The game made to be played fast developed fast [v1.9 means 9 days of development];

You can move each frame if you are fast enough;

Race with your friends for the best times on the maps you created;

Create crazy puzzles that don't make any sense at the beginning;

The game includes:

Standard set of 33 levels designed in paint, then recreated in the game;

Endless mode with neverending challenge;

Level creator to create your own levels;

Ability to load custom levels that are created from the level creator;

The map file is a  simple  .txt file you can send to your friends via Discord or sth;

More updates to come:

Quality of life improvements (More information boxes and better explanation of mechanics);

More Levels [100 if need be];

More mechanics [got like 5 in mind atm];

Multiplayer [hard, but doable];

Fix bugs that may arise [inevitable];

Follow the game development on :  https://www.twitch.tv/ununheksv.

Join the comunity to see how you stack against the others: https://discord.gg/RWT3d8BPWr

Complete level 32 for me to make you a custom trail;

Complete level 33 to be memorised forever in main menu for everyone to see;
